title: "In Neural Networks, Unbreakable Locks Can Hide Invisible Doors"
excerpt: "To better understand such vulnerabilities, researchers have developed various tricks to hide their own sample backdoors in machine learning models. But the approach has been largely trial and error, lacking formal mathematical analysis of how well those backdoors are hidden."
